tasks.description: Analyze and understand n8n codebase structure
tasks.prompt: Study the n8n workflow automation platform codebase to understand its architecture, key components, and development patterns

tasks.title: Fix Linter Errors - IMMEDIATE
tasks.description: Fix 0 errors and 0 warnings found in recently edited files: linter-errors.md
success_criteria: All linter errors in edited files resolved
development/linter-errors.md shows no issues for edited files
Code passes linting without warnings or errors

tasks.title: Implement Source Control Integration API
tasks.description: Add REST endpoints for source control operations including git pull, branch management, and repository status. Extends existing SourceControlService with new API endpoints.
success_criteria: Integration with existing git service working

tasks.title: Implement Advanced User Management API
tasks.description: Add advanced user management endpoints including role updates, bulk operations, and user analytics. Extends existing UserController with enhanced functionality.
success_criteria: User analytics and activity tracking working

tasks.title: Implement Resource Portability API
tasks.description: Add endpoints for transferring workflows and credentials between projects. Implements workflow/credential transfer with proper permission validation.

tasks.title: Implement Binary Data Management API
tasks.description: Create comprehensive binary data management endpoints for upload, download, and deletion with streaming support. Enhances existing binary data handling.
success_criteria: File streaming and chunked uploads supported
Proper MIME type detection and validation
Storage quota and security checks implemented

tasks.title: Implement Execution Control API
tasks.description: Add advanced execution control endpoints for cancellation, retry, and detailed execution data retrieval. Extends existing ExecutionsController.

tasks.title: Implement Node Testing API
tasks.description: Create endpoints for testing individual nodes and partial workflow execution. Enables node development and debugging capabilities.
success_criteria: Node parameter validation and testing supported
Test result formatting and error reporting

tasks.title: Implement AI Configuration API
tasks.description: Add endpoints for AI node configuration, prompt testing, and memory management. Integrates with existing AI node infrastructure.
success_criteria: AI node memory management endpoints working

tasks.title: Implement Performance Monitoring API
tasks.description: Add endpoints for performance profiling, resource monitoring, and system analytics. Enhances existing metrics collection.

tasks.title: Create Quality Improvement Tasks
tasks.description: Analyze project quality issues and create specific tasks to reach 100% quality for all strikes
tasks.prompt:
Project quality assessment shows issues preventing 100% strike success:

Quality Status:
- Strike 1 (Build): 50%
- Strike 2 (Lint): 70%  
- Strike 3 (Tests): 30%

Issues Found:
- Build Verification: node_modules not found - dependencies not installed
- Build Verification: Build command fails
- Lint and Code Quality: No ESLint configuration found
- Test Coverage and Success: Tests are failing
- Test Coverage and Success: No coverage script defined

TASK: Analyze these quality gaps and create specific improvement tasks to bring ALL strikes to 100% quality. Create tasks for:
1. Build issues (missing dependencies, build failures, configuration)
2. Code quality issues (lint errors, style violations, code standards)
3. Testing issues (failing tests, missing coverage, test setup)

Insert all improvement tasks BEFORE the strike review tasks. Strikes should always remain last in the task list.
success_criteria: All quality issues identified and analyzed
Specific improvement tasks created for each quality gap
Tasks properly prioritized and ordered before strikes

strike1.name: Build Verification
issues: node_modules not found - dependencies not installed

tasks.description: Review Strike 1: Ensure the project builds completely without errors
tasks.prompt:
Perform a comprehensive code review with focus on: Ensure the project builds completely without errors

Check the entire codebase and ensure this criterion is met.

## CRITICAL FAILURE RESPONSE PROTOCOL

IF BUILD FAILS: Create specific TASK CREATION tasks in TODO.json to fix build issues:
- Missing dependencies installation tasks
- Build configuration setup tasks  
- Compilation error resolution tasks
- Environment setup tasks
- Build script creation tasks

CRITICAL: Use TaskManager API to add these tasks immediately when build failures are detected.

## SUCCESS CRITERIA
- Mark this review task as completed ONLY if the criterion is fully met
- If criterion fails, you MUST create remediation tasks using TaskManager API before marking review as completed
- All new tasks should be actionable, specific, and include proper dependencies/important_files parameters

## TASK CREATION REQUIREMENT
When creating remediation tasks, ensure each task includes:
- Clear success criteria
- Appropriate mode (DEVELOPMENT/TESTING/REFACTORING)
- Specific file dependencies
- Realistic time estimates
- High priority for critical issues

Use the task-creation.md guidelines for optimal task structure.

tasks.description: Review Strike 3: Confirm test coverage is 100% on important modules and 90%+ on others, with all tests passing
